title: The Epstein case: Thirty years of judicial negligence, at the expense of victims
subhead: The first complaints against the millionaire date back to 1996. Yet between his initial conviction in 2008 and his arrest in the summer of 2019, he was never troubled by the justice system.

title: Gazans who fled the enclave face traumatic return
In substance, Rubio's message in Munich was the same as Vance's
French prosecutors open murder probe into killing of far-right activist
subhead: In a press conference on Monday, prosecutor Thierry Dran said the victim, far-right activist Quentin Deranque, 23, had sustained a severe brain injury after being attacked 'at least six' people at a far-right protest.

title: French far right points fingers at Mélenchon's LFI over death of activist in Lyon
subhead: Quentin D., a young far-right activist, died on Saturday following clashes between antifascists and identitarian groups in Lyon. Since then, the radical-left La France Insoumise party has been criticized for its ties to an antifascist group accused of taking part in the violence.

title: Robert Duvall, actor known for 'The Godfather' and 'Apocalypse Now,' dies at 95
subhead: Robert Duvall was known for playing William Kilgore, the US army officer who loved 'the smell of napalm in the morning,' in Francis Ford Coppola's 'Apocalypse Now,' and smooth mafia consigliere Tom Hagen in 'The Godfather.'

title: Agnès Delahaye, historian: 'The Minneapolis protests are part of the major historical social struggles in the US'
subhead: In an interview with Le Monde, the historian said that Donald Trump's narrative of a white America radiating power is intended to erase the complexity of a multicultural past shaped by violence and struggles for emancipation.

How Jeffrey Epstein built the global network that protected him
subhead: The sexual predator, who came from a modest background, used his scheming and manipulation to open the doors to the global elite. His influence was such that many powerful figures continued to associate with him, even after his first conviction in 2008.

title: Five vegan restaurants in Paris for food lovers
subhead: Whether you're looking for a quick lunch or a gourmet dinner, here is Le Monde's selection of 100% plant-based restaurants in the French capital.

title: Former French envoy to Moscow warns of a new US-Russia convergence
subhead: Confronted with hostility from both Russia and the US, Europe has been shaken by the disregard for international law, which underpins its very identity. French diplomat Pierre Lévy believes Europe must reassert its strengths.
